### TABLEDATA

CREATE TABLE financial_assets (
  asset_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  asset_name STRING NOT NULL,
  asset_type STRING,
  asset_value DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE asset_transactions (
  transaction_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  asset_id UUID,
  transaction_type STRING,
  transaction_date TIMESTAMP,
  transaction_amount DECIMAL,
  CONSTRAINT fk_asset_id FOREIGN KEY (asset_id) REFERENCES financial_assets(asset_id)
);

### STATEMENT

UPDATE financial_assets SET asset_value = 500 WHERE asset_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';

### TABLEDATA

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS Stocks (
    stock_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    stock_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    stock_price DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL,
    stock_quantity INT NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS Bonds (
    bond_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    bond_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    bond_value DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL,
    bond_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS Commodities (
    commodity_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    commodity_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    commodity_price DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL,
    commodity_quantity INT NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS Portfolio (
    portfolio_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    portfolio_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    total_value DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS Transactions (
    transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    transaction_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    transaction_date DATE NOT NULL,
    amount DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL,
    asset_id INT NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (asset_id) REFERENCES Stocks(stock_id) ON DELETE CASCADE
)

### STATEMENT

UPDATE Stocks SET stock_price = 150.00 WHERE stock_id = 1;
